shareholders.name: Luz Saude is owned (92,2%) by the chinese company Fosun International that generated more than 17 billions dollars in 2020.

translations.shareholders_es: Luz Saude es propriedad (92,2%) de la empresa china Fosum International que genero mas de 17 mil millones de dolares en 2020.
translations.shareholders_fr: Luz Saude est propriété (92,2%) de l'entreprise chinoise Fosum International qui a généré plus de 17 milliards de dollars en 2020.
translations.shareholders_en: Luz Saude is owned (92,2%) by the chinese company Fosun International that generated more than 17 billions dollars in 2020.

shareholders.name: Four Seasons is in process of restructuration. Terra Firma Capital Partners, the private equity firm led by Guy Hands, bought the group in 2012 for £825m but has since seen a £450m writedown on its investment. It ceded control of the group to US hedge fund H/2 Capital Partners, which holds a large amount of its debt.

translations.shareholders_es: Four Seasons está en proceso de reestructuración. Terra Firma Capital Partners, la firma de capital privado dirigida por Guy Hands, compró el grupo en 2012 por 825 millones de libras, pero desde entonces ha visto reducida su inversión en 450 millones de libras. Cedió el control del grupo al fondo de cobertura estadounidense H/2 Capital Partners, que posee gran parte de su deuda.
translations.shareholders_fr: Four Seasons est en cours de restructuration. Terra Firma Capital Partners, la société de capital-investissement dirigée par Guy Hands, a acheté le groupe en 2012 pour 825 millions de livres sterling, mais a depuis constaté une dépréciation de 450 millions de livres sterling sur son investissement. Elle a cédé le contrôle du groupe au fonds spéculatif américain H/2 Capital Partners, qui détient une grande partie de sa dette.
translations.shareholders_en: Four Seasons is in process of restructuration. Terra Firma Capital Partners, the private equity firm led by Guy Hands, bought the group in 2012 for £825m but has since seen a £450m writedown on its investment. It ceded control of the group to US hedge fund H/2 Capital Partners, which holds a large amount of its debt.

shareholders.name: Gruppo San Donato is owned by the Rotelli Family.

translations.shareholders_es: Gruppo San Donato es la propriedad de la familia Rotelli.
translations.shareholders_fr: Gruppo San Donato est la propriété de la famille Rotelli.
translations.shareholders_en: Gruppo San Donato is owned by the Rotelli Family.

shareholders.name: Victor’s Group is owned by Hartmut Ostermann, German entrepreneur and former politician.

translations.shareholders_es: Victor's Group es propriedad de Hartmut Ostermann, emprendedor y ex-politico aleman.
translations.shareholders_fr: Victor's Group est détenu par Hartmut Ostermann, entrepreneur et ancien politicien allemand.
translations.shareholders_en: Victor’s Group is owned by Hartmut Ostermann, German entrepreneur and former politician.

shareholders.name: Vivalto Santé is owned by investments funds FEF Capital, Grand Sud-Ouest Capital SA, Mubadala Investment Company, Mutuelle Assurances Corps Santé Français and BNP Paribas Development Management.

translations.shareholders_es: Vivalto Santé es propiedad de los fondos de inversión FEF Capital, Grand Sud-Ouest Capital SA, Mubadala Investment Company, Mutuelle Assurances Corps Santé Français y BNP Paribas Development Management.
translations.shareholders_fr: Vivalto Santé est détenue par les fonds d'investissement FEF Capital, Grand Sud-Ouest SA, Mubadala Investment Company, Mutuelle Assurances Corps Santé Français et BNP Paribas Development Management.
translations.shareholders_en: Vivalto Santé is owned by investments funds FEF Capital, Grand Sud-Ouest Capital SA, Mubadala Investment Company, Mutuelle Assurances Corps Santé Français and BNP Paribas Development Management.

shareholders.name: Kursana is a subsidiary of the Dussmann Group that generated 2,1 billion € in revenue in 2020.

translations.shareholders_es: Kursana es una filial del Grupo Dussmann que genero 2,1 mil millones de € en 2020.
translations.shareholders_fr: Kursana est une filiale du Groupe Dussmann qui a généré 2,1 milliards d'€ en 2020.
translations.shareholders_en: Kursana is a subsidiary of the Dussmann Group that generated 2,1 billion € in revenue in 2020.

shareholders.name: Nuffield is the largest charity in UK so it have not shareholders. As private provider, Nuffield charges patients for the offered services. Its business practices are very similar to commercial entities.

translations.shareholders_es: Nuffield es la mas grande organizacion benefica del Reino Unido, asi que no tiene accionistas. Como proveedor privado, Nuffield hace pagar por sus servicios. Su modelo economico es muy similar al de las entidades comerciales.
translations.shareholders_fr: Nuffield est la plus grande œuvre de bienfaisance du Royaume-Uni, elle n'a donc pas d'actionnaires. En tant que fournisseur privé, Nuffield fait payer pour ses services. Son modèle économique est très similaire à celui des entités commerciales.
translations.shareholders_en: Nuffield is the largest charity in UK so it have not shareholders. As private provider, Nuffield charges patients for the offered services. Its business practices are very similar to commercial entities.

shareholders.name: Colisée is majority owed by investment fund IK Investment Partners.

translations.shareholders_es: Colisée es detenida mayoritariamente por el fondo de inversion IK Investment Partners.
translations.shareholders_fr: Colisée est majoritairement détenue par le fonds d'investissement IK Investment Partners.
translations.shareholders_en: Colisée is majority owed by investment fund IK Investment Partners.

shareholders.name: Spire Healthcare and Hirslanden are part of the same group, Mediclinic International

translations.shareholders_es: Spire Healthcare e Hirslanden hacen parte del mismo grupo, Mediclinic International. Ramsay Healthcare esta tratando de comprar Spire.
translations.shareholders_fr: Spire Healthcare et Hirslanden font partie du même groupe, Mediclinic International. Ramsay Healthcare essaie d'acheter Spire.
translations.shareholders_en: Spire Healthcare and Hirslanden are part of the same group, Mediclinic International. Ramsay Healthcare is trying to buy Spire.

shareholders.name: BMI Healthcare is owned by the investment fund Circle Health.

translations.shareholders_es: BMI Healthcare es propriedad del fondo de inversion Circle Health.
translations.shareholders_fr: BMI Healthcare est propriété du fonds d'investissement Circle Health.
translations.shareholders_en: BMI Healthcare is owned by the investment fund Circle Health.

shareholders.name: Elsan is owned by investment funds in particular CVC Capital Partners, Tethys Invest (Bettencourt-Meyers Family), Ardian, KKR&Co, and by ELSAN founders and managers.

translations.shareholders_es: Elsan es propriedad de fondos de inversion, como CVC Capital Partners, Tethys Invest (familia Bettencourt-Meyers), Ardian y KKR&Co, asi como por sus fundadores y gerentes.
translations.shareholders_fr: Elsan est détenu par des fonds d'investissements, dont CVC Capital Partners, Tethys Invest (famille Bettencourt-Meyers), Ardian, et KKR&Co, ainsi que par les fondateurs et managers d'ELSAN.
translations.shareholders_en: Elsan is owned by investment funds in particular CVC Capital Partners, Tethys Invest (Bettencourt-Meyers Family), Ardian, KKR&Co, and by ELSAN founders and managers.

shareholders.name: Alloheim is owned by investment fund Nordic Capital that generated 9 billions € in revenue in 2020.

translations.shareholders_es: Alloheim es propriedad del fondo de inversion Nordic Capital que genero 9 mil millones de € en 2020.
translations.shareholders_fr: Alloheim est détenue par le fonds d'investissement Nordic Capital qui a généré 9 milliards d'€ en 2020.
translations.shareholders_en: Alloheim is owned by investment fund Nordic Capital that generated 9 billions € in revenue in 2020.

shareholders.name: HCA Healthcare UK is a subsidiary of the US group HCA Healthcare. The accounts and shareholders are those of the US group.

translations.shareholders_es: HCA Healthcare UK es la filial del grupo estadounidense HCA Healthcare. Las cuentas y accionistas son los del grupo estadounidense.
translations.shareholders_fr: HCA Healthcare UK est la filiale du groupe états-uniens HCA Healthcare. Les comptes et actionnaires sont ceux du groupe états-unien.
translations.shareholders_en: HCA Healthcare UK is a subsidiary of the US group HCA Healthcare. The accounts and shareholders are those of the US group.

shareholders.name: Hirslanden is part of the International Group Mediclinic (like Spire Healthcare)

translations.shareholders_es: Hirslanden hace parte del grupo internacional Mediclinic (como Spire Healthcare)
translations.shareholders_fr: Hirslanden fait partie du groupe international Mediclinic (comme Spire Healthcare)
translations.shareholders_en: Hirslanden is part of the International Group Mediclinic (like Spire Healthcare)

translations.shareholders_es: Askepios tiene una participacion mayoritaria en Rhön Klinikum.
translations.shareholders_fr: Asklepios détient les parts majoritaires dans Rhön Klinikum.
translations.shareholders_en: Asklepios holds a majority stake in Rhön Klinikum.

shareholders.name: BNP Paribas Asset Management France SAS
The Public Sector Pension Investment Board
Schön Klinik SE is a property of the Schön Family and since 2016 it has minority participation of the investment fund Carlyle.

translations.shareholders_es: Schön Klinik SE es propriedad de la familia Schön y desde 2016 el fondo de inversion Carlyle detiene una participacion minoritaria.
translations.shareholders_fr: Schön Klinik SE est propriété de la famille Schön et depuis 2016 le fonds d'investissement Carlyle détient une participation minoritaire.
translations.shareholders_en: Schön Klinik SE is a property of the Schön Family and since 2016 it has minority participation of the investment fund Carlyle.

shareholders.name: HC-ONE is owned by investment funds Formation Capital LLC, Safanad and Court Cavendish.

translations.shareholders_es: HC-ONE es propriedad de los fondos de inversion Formation Capital LLC, Safanad y Court Cavendish.
translations.shareholders_fr: HC-ONE est détenue par les fonds d'investissement Formation Capital LLC, Safanad et Court Cavendish.
translations.shareholders_en: HC-ONE is owned by investment funds Formation Capital LLC, Safanad and Court Cavendish.

shareholders.name: Penta is an investment fund founded in Slovakia in 1994. It focuses on investments into healthcare, financial services, manufacturing, retail, media and real estate development, but healthcare is it's largest portfolio. It owns Penta Hospitals International which have hospital in Slovakia, Czech Republic and Poland. It has not been possible to find data about operating costs of Penta Hospitals International, so we publish here the general accounts of Penta Investment.

translations.shareholders_es: Penta es un fondo de inversión fundado en Eslovaquia en 1994. Se centra en inversiones en los sectores de la salud, los servicios financieros, la fabricación, el comercio minorista, los medios de comunicación y el desarrollo inmobiliario, pero la salud es su mayor cartera. Es propietaria de Penta Hospitals International, que tiene hospitales en Eslovaquia, República Checa y Polonia. No ha sido posible encontrar datos sobre los costes de explotación de Penta Hospitals International, por lo que publicamos aquí las cuentas generales de Penta Investment.
translations.shareholders_fr: Penta est un fonds d'investissement fondé en Slovaquie en 1994. Il se concentre sur les investissements dans les soins de santé, les services financiers, la fabrication, la vente au détail, les médias et le développement immobilier, mais les soins de santé constituent son principal portefeuille. Il possède Penta Hospitals International, qui a des hôpitaux en Slovaquie, en République tchèque et en Pologne. Il n'a pas été possible de trouver des données sur les coûts d'exploitation de Penta Hospitals International, nous publions donc ici les comptes généraux de Penta Investment.
translations.shareholders_en: Penta is an investment fund founded in Slovakia in 1994. It focuses on investments into healthcare, financial services, manufacturing, retail, media and real estate development, but healthcare is it's largest portfolio. It owns Penta Hospitals International which have hospital in Slovakia, Czech Republic and Poland. It has not been possible to find data about operating costs of Penta Hospitals International, so we publish here the general accounts of Penta Investment.

shareholders.name: Ramsay Santé is a subsidiary of the Australian group Ramsay Health Care.

translations.shareholders_es: Ramsay Santé es una filial del grupo australiano Ramsay Health Care.
translations.shareholders_fr: Ramsay Santé est une filiale du groupe australien Ramsay Health Care.
translations.shareholders_en: Ramsay Santé is a subsidiary of the Australian group Ramsay Health Care.

shareholders.name: SRH Kliniken (Charity) was founded in 1955 by the Evangelian Workers Movement of Heidelberg. It is now managed by the SRH Holding, a German private foundation.

translations.shareholders_es: SRH Kliniken (asociacion caritativa) fue fundada en 1955 por el Movimiento Obrero Evangélico de Heidelberg. En la actualidad está gestionada por el SRH Holding, una fundación privada alemana.
translations.shareholders_fr: SRH Kliniken (association caritative) a été fondée en 1955 par le mouvement ouvrier évangélique de Heidelberg. Elle est aujourd'hui gérée par la SRH Holding, une fondation privée allemande.
translations.shareholders_en: SRH Kliniken (Charity) was founded in 1955 by the Evangelian Workers Movement of Heidelberg. It is now managed by the SRH Holding, a German private foundation.

shareholders.name: Maisons de Famille is owned by the founder family (Hugues Harmel) and by the invesment fund Creadev (Mulliez Family, owners of Auchan and Décathlon)

translations.shareholders_es: Maisons de Famille es propriedad de la familia del fundador (Hugues Harmel) y del fondo de inversion Creadev (familia Mulliez, proprietaria de Auchan y Décathlon)
translations.shareholders_fr: Maisons de Famille est détenue par la famille du fondateur (Hugues Harmel) et par le fonds d'investissement Creadev (famille Mulliez, proporiétaire d'Auchan et Décathlon)
translations.shareholders_en: Maisons de Famille is owned by the founder family (Hugues Harmel) and by the invesment fund Creadev (Mulliez Family, owners of Auchan and Décathlon)

shareholders.name: Helios is the hospitals subsidiary of the Fresenius Group

translations.shareholders_es: Helios es la filial ospitalaria del grupo Fresenius
translations.shareholders_fr: Helios est la filiale hospitalière du groupe Fresenius
translations.shareholders_en: Helios is the hospitals subsidiary of the Fresenius Group

shareholders.name: Asklepios was founded and is owned by Bernard Broermann.

translations.shareholders_es: Asklepios pertenece a su fundador, Bernard Broermann.
translations.shareholders_fr: Asklepios appartient à son fondateur, Bernard Broermann.
translations.shareholders_en: Asklepios was founded and is owned by Bernard Broermann.

shareholders.name: Bupa Care and Health Services in UK is owned by Bupa, international group that generated 12 billion £ in 2020. The Bupa Group has no shareholders as it is a non-profit organization.

translations.shareholders_es: Bupa Healthcare es propriedad de Bupa, grupo internacional que genero 12 mil millones de £ en 2020. El grupo Bupa no tiene accionistas porque es una organizacion si animo de lucro.
translations.shareholders_fr: Bupa Healthcare est propriété de Bupa, groupe international qui a généré 12 milliards de £ en 2020. Le groupe Bupa n'a pas d'actionnaire en tant qu'organisation sans but lucratif.
translations.shareholders_en: Bupa Healthcare is owned by Bupa, international group that generated 12 billion £ in 2020. The Bupa Group has no shareholders as it is a non-profit organization.

shareholders.name: Barchester Healthcare is owned in particular by the Irish tycoons John Magnier, JP McManus and Dermot Desmond.

translations.shareholders_es: Barchester Healthcare es propriedad de los magnates irlandeses John Magnier, JP McManus y Dermot Desmond.
translations.shareholders_fr: Barchester Healthcare est propriété des magnats irlandais John Magnier, JP McManus et Dermot Desmond.
translations.shareholders_en: Barchester Healthcare is owned in particular by the Irish tycoons John Magnier, JP McManus and Dermot Desmond.

shareholders.name: DomusVi is majority owned by investment funds Intermediate Capital Group (ICG) and Sagesse Retraite Santé (owned by founder Yves Journel).

translations.shareholders_es: DomusVi es detenida mayoritariamente por los fondos de inversion Capital Group (ICG) y Sagesse Retraite Santé (propriedad del fundador Yves Journel).
translations.shareholders_fr: DomusVi est détenue majoritairement par les fonds d'investissement Capital Group (ICG) et Sagesse Retraite Santé (détenu par le fondateur Yves Journel).
translations.shareholders_en: DomusVi is majority owned by investment funds Intermediate Capital Group (ICG) and Sagesse Retraite Santé (owned by founder Yves Journel).
